activation.en: Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

effect.en:
Once per Duel, you can add 1 card with an effect that requires a die roll from your Deck to your hand, then place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck. Apply the following Skill:
● Once per turn, when you roll a dice for a card or effect, you may re-roll the result once.
